tool_description: Generates correlation matrices between portfolio assets to assess diversification and identify concentration risks across holdings.

returns_matrix.description: 2D array where each sub-array contains returns for one asset across time periods

asset_symbols.description: Array of asset symbols corresponding to returns matrix rows

correlation_method.description: Correlation calculation method: pearson, spearman, kendall

min_observations.description: Minimum number of overlapping observations required for correlation calculation

error_messages: Matrix dimension error: returns_matrix and asset_symbols must have matching dimensions.
Insufficient data: Each asset must have at least min_observations data points.
Invalid correlation method: Use pearson, spearman, or kendall.
Data quality error: Returns data contains invalid values (NaN or infinite values).
Minimum assets error: At least 2 assets required for correlation analysis.
usage: Provide returns data matrix and corresponding asset symbols to generate correlation matrix. Optionally specify correlation method and minimum observation requirements.

correlation_matrix.description: 2D correlation matrix with values between -1 and 1

average_correlation.description: Average pairwise correlation across all assets

highest_correlation.description: Highest correlation coefficient in the matrix

lowest_correlation.description: Lowest correlation coefficient in the matrix
